Why Static Website Generators Are The Next Big Thing

At StaticGen, the open-source directory of static website generators, they have kept track of more than a hundred generators for more than a year now, and you can see both the volume and popularity of these projects take off incredibly on GitHub during that time, going from just 50 to more than 100 generators and a total of more than 100,000 stars for static website generator repositories.Â Read more
